pages.text: This architecture can be formed under a single block, and multi-block structures have other uses, please see below. $(br2)This is achieved by injecting the weight of reinforced scrolls into the recasting scroll and using the recasting scroll to refresh the equipment's prefix.

There are two modes for this architecture: $(br2)Injection Mode: Place any type of reinforced scroll on the left side and the recasting scroll on the right side to inject the weight of the reinforced scroll into the recasting scroll. $(br2)If the reinforced scroll has a weapon loss probability, only the non-loss part is injected. $(br2)For example, the Togepi Scroll actually injects 2500 * (1-30%) = 1750 weight. $(br2)It should be noted that this operation is $(c)irreversible$().

When recasting, the weight will be multiplied by the current difficulty coefficient of the modpack. $(br2)After injecting weight into the recasting scroll, the player can hover over it to see the percentage of prefixes it can recast. $(br2)The higher the weight, the higher the probability of upgrading to higher prefixes, but each weight refresh is random, so a higher weight $(c)does not necessarily$() mean a higher probability of high prefixes. $(br2)The other mode is the recasting mode, which requires placing the recasting scroll on the left and the equipment to be refreshed with prefixes on the right.

Press the recast button to refresh the equipment's prefix, and the probability will be determined by the probability of the recasting scroll. $(br2)Each recasting scroll can only be used once. $(br2)Recasting scrolls can be exchanged for at the highest level of EMCWorld's Energy Condenser. $(br2)Some Energy Condenser and weapons will have a minimum prefix, such as epic prefixes for Energy Condenser +22 and above. $(br2)Multi-block structures can increase additional injection in injection mode, and multi-block structures are shown on the next page.
